questions.question: Man Yokai Iapanui tol sui rhû dhol-gaer?
questions.lore: I Tako Nyūdō gaer-úan, anírathol darthad sui aen. Schnî hên sui 'siob', dan mae gaer-vorn beleg.

questions.question: Man gwanod narn e-Ahuizotl?
questions.lore: I Ahuizotl iuitha i-cham na i-dhelu anim maba. Hên sui hû egor rasg, dan delu 'nûr.

questions.question: Na dhú Uncanny Coffee Hour, amman Mitch ú-sogo i-gahu?
questions.lore: Aen hû condir i-chû gahu, Mitch chwîn na i-ereb. Narn naegra.

questions.question: Mi narn Iwerddon, man uan i 'Saoirse'?
questions.lore: I Púca gwath-e-gorf o narn Chelt, istanna sui faer-leutha i tola galu egor ú-alu.

questions.question: Man i ven maer anim dartha faer dhu?
questions.lore: Ang tîra bell e-Coe, a Hal glêna. I rim úan ú-anírathar i-chem.

questions.question: Man i condir dae na Odd Bob?
questions.lore: Hîr. Kitsune tola ist a gwedh na i-chû e-Coffee Hour.

questions.question: I 'Fresno Nightcrawler' úan, man 'gwanod'?
questions.lore: Tirnen minui mi Fresno, California, in-rim hin siila sui telch glân padol ereb pen-rhaw.

questions.question: Manen dagra Kappa pen-dagor?
questions.lore: Kappa vaer. Pi suilannach, suilannathar ad, a i-nen cuil mi i-felf panta.

questions.question: Man tola pi pantach hal?
questions.lore: Fui aníra haded nîf thar i-amnc hair anim dartha i-raug.

questions.question: Man úan istanna na rovail voth a hin cair?
questions.lore: Mothman o Point Pleasant, WV, istanna na hin cair a palan-dir naeg.

ranks.loseMsg: Tiro in-Charch a ad-tolo ir pheriannen.
